person.persName: Samuel Landrum (Fulton County, Kentucky, judge and merchant)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, merchant and judge. Virginia native. Married to Volumnia W. Lawson Landrum in Obion County, Tennessee, on February 21, 1853. Father of Lovie A. Landrum, Samuel L. Landrum, and Mary V. Landrum. Married to Mary Elizabeth “Bettie” Guthrie Landrum in Obion County, Tennessee, on August 6, 1863. Father of Clarence Landrum. Merchant in Fulton County in 1860. Judge of the Fulton County Court in 1863.
